column4: I had ubuntu installed as my primary os, then I installed windows 7... I never deleted the ubuntu partition I created a new one for the windows os... how can I access the linux partition and boot into it again? I don't get any boot options when the computer starts...
*face desk* I sort of knew about a "boot loader" just never put 1 and 1 together
It's great when a plan comes together. :-)
